proof_script:
lemma tendsto_matpower [tendsto_intros]: "(f \<longlongrightarrow> a) F \<Longrightarrow> ((\<lambda>x. matpow (f x) n) \<longlongrightarrow> matpow a n) F" for f :: "'a \<Rightarrow> 'b :: {semiring_1, real_normed_algebra} ^ 'n ^ 'n"
by (induction n) (auto intro: tendsto_intros simp: matpow_def mult.assoc)

agent_info.successful_proof:
lemma tendsto_matpower [tendsto_intros]: "(f \<longlongrightarrow> a) F \<Longrightarrow> ((\<lambda>x. matpow (f x) n) \<longlongrightarrow> matpow a n) F" for f :: "'a \<Rightarrow> 'b :: {semiring_1, real_normed_algebra} ^ 'n ^ 'n"
by (induction n) (auto intro: tendsto_intros simp: matpow_def mult.assoc)
